channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Shop Page WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Shop Page WP

item.title: CVE-2021-24811|2024-08-03T19:42:17.193Z -- unknown -- shop%20page%20wp
item.description: The Shop Page WP WordPress plugin before 1.2.8 does not sanitise and escape some of the Product fields, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
